    • Method Detail

      • movement

        public boolean movement(Gamemap map)
        The automatic AI movement of the enemies, called every second. will move according to which cardinal direction they are currently on
        Parameters:
        map - so the enemy can check the collision objects
        Returns:
        boolean whether the enemy hit the player or not

      • collisionDecision

        public abstract void collisionDecision(Gamemap map)
        When faced with a wall the enemies will make a decision on what direction they should go in next, this method is overriden by the class RedEnemy and Yellow Enemy. The Red Enemy moves in a straight line and turns to a random decision every time its path is blocked by a solid/broken wall. The Yellow Enemy moves in a straight line, but on collision with a wall will attempt to move clockwise is called when faced with a wall, will continue to call movement until not blocked by a wall
